body: This lists the haunt's effective hit points for the purposes of resolving positive energy damage. A haunt's hit points are equal to twice its CR, except in the case of a persistent haunt, in which case its hit points are equal to its CR × 4.5 (round fractions down).
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Elements of a Haunt/hp
name: hp
